Data: {"recipient_id": "464ab21e-494c-4e78-81ac-58e2844e5f42", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hi
Hello! How can I assist you today?
I want to top the balance in my account

Currently, the ability to add ad credit is not available for newly created accounts by default. To become eligible, your account must complete and pass business verification, accumulate over $5,000 in spend, and establish a relationship with an Account Manager (AM). If you need help connecting with an AM or have further questions, feel free to ask!
I need an account manager

Thanks for your interest! At this time, dedicated account management is reserved for advertisers who meet a daily spend threshold of $1,000 or more. If you’re not at that level yet, no worries — our self-serve platform has everything you need to launch and optimize your campaigns successfully. Our support team is also available via chat or email if you need any help. Let us know if you’d like assistance getting started.
yes but I have to top the balance to run the campaign

To enable the ad credit functionality, your account needs to complete business verification and accumulate over $5,000 in spend. Once these conditions are met, you can establish a relationship with an Account Manager who can request the ad credit functionality for you. If you need help with business verification or have any questions, feel free to ask!
Hi Ad credit button

The ad credit functionality is not available for newly created accounts by default. To enable it, your account must complete business verification and accumulate over $5,000 in spend. Once these conditions are met, you can establish a relationship with an Account Manager who can request the ad credit functionality for you. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
Hi
Hello! How can I assist you today?
Please pause all the 3rd party publisher for the Campaign ID:1942526924767780866
I need only newsbreak inventory

I'm unable to directly pause third-party publishers for your campaign. However, you can manage this through your campaign settings on the platform. If you need detailed guidance on how to do this, please let me know!

To focus on Newsbreak inventory, you can adjust your campaign settings to exclude third-party publishers. This can be done by selecting only Newsbreak as your preferred inventory source in the targeting options. If you need help navigating these settings, feel free to ask!
where please guide

To adjust your campaign settings to focus only on Newsbreak inventory, follow these steps:

1. Log in to your Newsbreak Ad Manager account.
2. Navigate to the 'Campaigns' section and select the campaign you want to modify.
3. Go to the 'Targeting' or 'Inventory' settings within the campaign.
4. Deselect any third-party publishers and ensure that only Newsbreak is selected as your inventory source.
5. Save your changes.

If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
Not able to see the option

If you're unable to see the option to select only Newsbreak inventory, it might be due to account settings or permissions. I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They can help ensure your account is set up correctly and guide you through the process.
